title: Clipdiary 3.2 Portable [ak]
description:
Clipdiary 3.2 Portable

Clipdiary is a powerful clipboard manager, which records every piece of data that goes to the Windows clipboard, meaning that you can easily retrieve any information that was once copied to the clipboard (if Clipdiary was running at that moment).

Clipdiary -- what does it do for you?
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Automatically saves every piece of data copied to the clipboard
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Lets you quickly retrieve any text from its database, so that you can either place it into the clipboard or paste it directly into any application
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ At your request, strips away any formatting from text, so that you can easily paste it as plain text
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Lets you search through the clipboard history

This clipboard manager is handy if you want to:
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Quickly find and paste a piece of text that was in the clipboard some time ago
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Find any data that was once placed into the clipboard
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Restore the clipboard contents (if they were accidentally overwritten)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Convert any text to plain text (by stripping away its formatting)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Save a lot of time and increase your productivity

Version 3.2
Added: Highlighting of pasted clips. Read about highlighting of the used clipboard history in our blog
Added: Export images from clipboard history to file (supports bmp, jpg, png and xpm formats).
Added: Advanced options for incremental search. Read about incremental search through clipboard history in our blog
Fixed: Case-insensitive search for non-latin characters

Home Page - http://clipdiary.com/
